title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Dec 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Dec 24 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, welcomes James "Bo Snerdley" Golden to the show. Snerdley discusses some of the personal memories and stories from his book, Rush on the Radio: A Tribute from His Sidekick for 30 Years. Dittoheads call in to pay tribute to El Rushbo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
